original_text: Moses gave them all the towns on the flat land. He gave them all the land of Sihon, king of the Amorites. Sihon had ruled from Hebron. But Moses had won the fight against him and the Midianite kings, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur and Reba. These kings had ruled with Sihon and they lived in his land.
korean_text: 평지 모든 성읍과 헤스본에서 다스리던 아모리 족속의 왕 시혼의 온 나라라 모세가 시혼을 그 땅에 거주하는 시혼의 군주들 곧 미디안의 귀족 에위와 레겜과 술과 훌과 레바와 함께 죽였으며

sentences.original_text: Moses gave them all the towns on the flat land.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 그들에게 평지의 모든 성읍을 주었다.

sentences.original_text: He gave them all the land of Sihon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 시혼의 모든 땅을 그들에게 주었다.

sentences.original_text: But Moses had won the fight against him
Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur and Reba.
sentences.korean_translation: 에위, 레겜, 수르, 후르, 그리고 레바였다.

sentences.original_text: These kings had ruled with Sihon
and they lived in his land.
